channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 17:40 The threat of artobrats in the Bilenkovsky territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Zaporizhzhia region
item.description: 🟡 17:40 The threat of artobrats in the Bilenkovsky territorial community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Zaporizhzhia region#Bilenkovskaya_The territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
